Sentencas: Knowing the correlation between grain boundary mobility and oxygen potential in yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ), we have utilized the grain size as a microstructural marker to map local oxygen potential.
Titulo: Electrical and hydrogen reduction enhances kinetics in doped zirconia and ceria: II. Mapping electrode polarization and vacancy condensation in YSZ

Sentencas: Abrupt oxygen potential transition is established under a large current density and in thicker samples.
Titulo: Electrical and hydrogen reduction enhances kinetics in doped zirconia and ceria: II. Mapping electrode polarization and vacancy condensation in YSZ

Sentencas: Cathodically depressed oxygen potential can be easily triggered by poor electrode kinetics or in an oxygen-lean environment.
Titulo: Electrical and hydrogen reduction enhances kinetics in doped zirconia and ceria: II. Mapping electrode polarization and vacancy condensation in YSZ

Sentencas: Widespread cavitation in the presence of highly reducing oxygen potential suggests oxygen vacancy condensation instead of oxygen bubble formation as commonly assumed for solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cells.
Titulo: Electrical and hydrogen reduction enhances kinetics in doped zirconia and ceria: II. Mapping electrode polarization and vacancy condensation in YSZ

Sentencas: These results also suggest electrode kinetics has a direct influence on the microstructure and properties of ceramics sintered under a large electric current.
Titulo: Electrical and hydrogen reduction enhances kinetics in doped zirconia and ceria: II. Mapping electrode polarization and vacancy condensation in YSZ
